Subject: The Otyebis

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

President Kaiser:



Upon receiving the information gathered from all transmissions Kaiser 
activated a comm. link with the perimeter guard, ordering them to be on full 
alert for possible incoming hostiles.  He also sent a transmission to 
Vice-President Suka.

"Vice-President Suka, have fifteen of our troops ready to be escorts for the 
incoming 'Infecticon' force due to arrive at our ship."
